rules_text:
This spell deals 1 damage to any target.
Flashback {1}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
As long as this spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, it has storm. [i](When you cast a spell with storm, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)[/i]
